data.contentText:
Gestation of the baby to the nearest week?

Which of the following methods was used to measure gestation antenatally?
A) Last menstrual period (LMP) or length of pregnancy
B) Fundal height
C) Ultrasound scan

A) and B) can be innacurate so should be followed up postnatally with Ballard/Maturity score

FH,Fundal height
USS,USS
UK,Unknown
